thread.title: Marcio Oliveira

author: Marcio Oliveira
title: Marcio Oliveira
text:
So when we move to our new home we choose BritishGas because they have this offer online:
"Free electricity Every Saturday or Sunday from 9amâ€“5pm with one of our new smart meter FreeTime"
We move on last October and since then have been a nightmare to have this service active at our home, first the system online don't realise that we are requesting service for a new home and just spend weeks without nothing happen or even a single contact from BGas side.
Today I receive the visit of another Service Engineer and guess what... Once again it wasn't possible to have the smart meter fitted and this time the excuse was something about the electrical device that is outside is not able to link with the home device or something like that?!
Now I'm waiting for another call to book another day just to do this, hope soon.
To be honest thing very well when you need to choose this kind of service and ask for another company's as well for Quote: s,
Not happy in the end!
